revised_title: Case of a Lad Shot through the Lungs and the Treatment of Empyema
tldr: The article describes the case of a 14-year-old boy who was accidentally shot in the lungs and the subsequent medical treatment for the resulting empyema. The boy survived the gunshot wound and the empyema, but experienced several relapses and complications over the years. The author provides a detailed account of the medical interventions and the patient's recovery process.
